attributes.action: Recall Parliament early to impose immediate sanctions on Israel
attributes.additional_details:
Urgent supplies are needed in Gaza. Babies, children, women and men are starving to death daily. Infant milk formula and food aid sits a few miles away. 

Israel has declared that they will not stop with their military offensive, but instead to intensify it.
attributes.background:
The UK government must take more immediate action to impose sanctions on Israel and assist with a humanitarian effort to get supplies in Gaza. 

Other UK leaders have called on Keir Starmer to do this on 18 August 2025. The public must add their support.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734274
